name: Chasing Spirits
description:
Run against each other in a Voxel environment.

No Time Limit.  Take it easy and have fun.

Controls (In-Game):

Player 1

A - Left

D - Right

W - Activate trap

Spacebar - Jump / Double Jump

 

Player 2

Arrow key left - Left

Arrow key right - Right

Arrow key up - Activate trap

Einfg/0 - Jump / Double Jump

A (buggy) Project of 3 Artists and 2  Programmer.
